kpi_definitions.name: Strategic Growth
kpi_definitions.description: Measures progress toward company-wide strategic objectives and goals.

kpi_definitions.name: Employee Satisfaction
kpi_definitions.description: Employee happiness and retention metrics based on surveys and feedback.

kpi_definitions.name: Revenue Growth
kpi_definitions.description: Tracks revenue increase over previous periods.

kpi_definitions.name: Innovation Index
kpi_definitions.description: Quantifies innovation based on new initiatives, R&D, and patents.

kpi_definitions.name: Team Target Achievement
kpi_definitions.description: Percentage of targets achieved by the manager's team.

kpi_definitions.name: Client Acquisition
kpi_definitions.description: Number of new clients acquired within a period.

kpi_definitions.name: Recruitment Efficiency
kpi_definitions.description: Average time and success rate of hiring processes.

kpi_definitions.name: Training Effectiveness
kpi_definitions.description: Impact of training programs on employee performance.
